Title: Story of Your Life
Author: Ted Chiang
Description: A science fiction short story collection by Ted Chiang, including the famous 'Story of Your Life,' which was the basis for the movie Arrival.

Author: George Orwell
Description: A dystopian social science fiction novel by George Orwell, depicting a totalitarian society under constant surveillance.

Title: The Moon and Sixpence
Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Description: A novel by W. Somerset Maugham inspired by the life of the painter Paul Gauguin, following a protagonist who leaves his comfortable life to pursue his passion for painting.

Title: Stray Birds
Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Description: A collection of poems by Rabindranath Tagore that explores the beauty of nature, love, and the human spirit.

Title: Fear-of-flying
Author: Erica Jong
Description: It's an anxiety disorder that causes people to experience intense fear or panic when flying or anticipating flying. This condition can interfere with someone's ability to travel for work or pleasure.

Title: Letting-Go
Author: David, Hawkins
Description: Letting Go: is about how to move from feeling stuck to being happy and at peace

Title: One-Morning-in-Maine
Author: Robert McCloskey
Description: One Morning in Maine is a Caldecott Honor Book by Robert McCloskey about a young girl named Sal who learns about growing up after losing her first baby toot

Title: By-any-other-name
Author: Eric Cotter
Description: By Any Other Name is a contemporary romance novel by Lauren Kate about Lanie, a romance editor who gets promoted to editorial director if she can get the publisher's biggest author, Noa Callaway, to submit her late manuscript in three months
